channel.title: Dialouge help
channel.description:
hello,
im working on the lumbridge castle fixing doors stairs and all otherr crap aroud that
now im working on the second floor staircase and i want it when u click on it it gives you an option it.
climb_up_or_down_the_stairs? climb_up_the_stairs. Climb_down_the_stairs.
now i cant figure it out how it works could someone explane to me how i should make this dialouge?

item.title: Dialouge help
item.dc:creator: @wicked_destiny wicked destiny
item.description:
@wicked_destiny wrote:

used this

placed in object click 1

case 1739: if (actionTimer == 0) { selectoption("climb up or down the stairs?", "Climb up the stairs.", "Climb down the stairs.", ""); OptionObject = objectID; } break;

placed in case 185 underneeth case 9157

else if(OptionObject == 1739) { heightLevel += 1; OptionObject = -1; RemoveAllWindows(); }

placed in case 185 underneeth case 9158

else if(OptionObject == 1739) { //option one heightLevel -= 1; OptionObject = -1; RemoveAllWindows(); }

why doesnt this work??

Read full topic

item.title: Dialouge help
item.dc:creator: @openice123 openice123
item.description:
@openice123 wrote:

[quote=“wicked destiny, post:1, topic:162179”]hello,

im working on the lumbridge castle fixing doors stairs and all otherr crap aroud that

now im working on the second floor staircase and i want it when u click on it it gives you an option it.

climb_up_or_down_the_stairs?
climb_up_the_stairs.
Climb_down_the_stairs.

now i cant figure it out how it works could someone explane to me how i should make this dialouge?[/quote]

in the tut section it has a topic on portals in that tut it has select option
after that to make it go up to heightLevel += 1; and to go down heightLevel -= 1;

Read full topic
